import React,{useState} from 'react' import { Dropdown, FormInput, Grid, Input } from 'semantic-ui-react' import img from '../../img/slide2.jpg' import FavoriteBorderIcon from '@material-ui/icons/FavoriteBorder'; import { MoreVert, Share } from '@material-ui/icons' import { Modal } from 'semantic-ui-react' import SwapHorizIcon from '@material-ui/icons/SwapHoriz'; import { IconButton } from '@material-ui/core' const InspImage = (props) => { const [currentvalue, setcurrentvalue] = useState("Select") const [openmodel, setopenmodel] = useState(false) // const [overlayoptions, setoverlayoptions] = useState(initialoptions) const [initialoptions,setinitialoptions] = useState([ { key: 1, text: 'Bedroom', value: 1 }, { key: 2, text: 'Drawing Room', value: 2 }, { key: 3, text: 'Washroom/Toilet', value: 3 }, { key: 4, text: 'Study Room', value: 4 }, { key: 5, text: 'kitchen ', value: 5 }, { key: 6, text: 'Balcony', value: 6 }, ]); const handleopenmodel = (img) => { setopenmodel(true) } const handleclosemodel = () => { setopenmodel(false) } const handleselectchange=(e)=>{ setcurrentvalue(e.target.value) } const handleboardaddition=(e, {value})=>{ setinitialoptions([ ...initialoptions,{ key:initialoptions.length, text:value, value:initialoptions.length } ]) setc } return (
Save

) } export default InspImage
